Title: Hudugaru
Writer: Samudra Kani (story), Samudra Kani (screenplay), Guruprasad (dialogue), V. Nagendra Prasad (lyricist), Jayanth Kaikini (lyricist), Yograj Bhat (lyricist)
Actors: Puneeth Rajkumar, Srinagar Kitty, Yogesh, Radhika Pandit
Plot: The story revolves around three friends who are desperately looking out for suitable job opportunities. Their lives get devastated when they try to unite two lovers.
